DOC.brief_summary: A research study to see how safe and effective MK0217 is when taken weekly for the prevention and treatment of steroid induced bone loss.
DOC.brief_title: A Research Study to Evaluate the Safety and Effectiveness of MK0217 to Prevent and Treat Bone Loss (0217-193)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Man or woman aged 18 to 80 years, being treated with oral glucocorticoid (steroid), without vertebral fracture or prior osteoporotic fracture Mentally or legally incompetent, pregnant, alcohol or drug dependence, history of heart disease, kidney disease, hypertension, upper gastrointestinal disease, cancer, being treated with hormone replacement therapy, or life expectancy of less than 3 years
